idea-plugin.name: org.campagnelab.NextflowWorkbench
idea-plugin.description: The Nextflow workbench is a set of languages developed with the Jetbrains MPS Language Workbench that make it easier to write data analysis workflows with Nextflow (see http://www.nextflow.io/). Reference build: ${build_number}, commit: ${reference_commit}, branch: ${reference_branch}
